official_title: An original resolution to pay a gratuity to Mary Lucy Kuhl Haworth, Frances T. Kuhl, Pius A. Kuhl, James H. Kuhl, and Richard A. Kuhl.

summary.text: Directs the payment of a gratuity in a specified amount to named survivors of a former employee of the Senate.

titles.title: An original resolution to pay a gratuity to Mary Lucy Kuhl Haworth, Frances T. Kuhl, Pius A. Kuhl, James H. Kuhl, and Richard A. Kuhl.
